mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worryBoard(worryPostNum, userId, subject, content, views, created, groupNum, depth, orderNo, parent) VALUES (#{worryPostNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{views}, #{created}, #{groupNum}, #{depth}, #{orderNo}, #{parent})
mapper.update: UPDATE worryBoard SET orderNo=orderNo+1 WHERE groupNum=#{groupNum} AND orderNo > #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM worryBoard w JOIN memberInfo m ON w.userId=m.userId

SELECT worryPostNum, w.userId, nickName, subject, DATE_FORMAT(w.created, '%Y-%m-%d') created , views, w.created, depth, groupNum, orderNo, parent FROM worryBoard w JOIN memberInfo m ON w.userId=m.userId
ORDER BY groupNum DESC, orderNo ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}

SELECT worryPostNum, w.userId, nickName, subject, content, w.created, views, groupNum, orderNo, depth, parent FROM worryBoard w JOIN memberInfo m ON w.userId=m.userId WHERE worryPostNum=#{worryPostNum}

AND ((groupNum=#{groupNum} AND orderNo < #{orderNo}) OR (groupNum > #{groupNum}))
ORDER BY groupNum ASC, orderNo DESC LIMIT 1
